model

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAOIF

    public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAOIF
    The Data Access Object to handle database connections, uses hibernate
    Version:
    1.6 05.03.2021
    Author:
    Aki Koppinen, Tuomas Rajala
